entry.title: About
entry.content:
Game Magics

Game Magics is a game/game hardware study orgnization, whose name is neta from series of monogattari’s OP Mathemagics.
We founded this project to study together and share knowledge about game/game hardware.
Projects introductions, project blogs, documents and tutorial would be included in this website.

Home page：GameMagics

Assets Used

The cover image is from Pixiv57736585, while avatar and icon is from Pixiv77315794.
If there is a tort, please contact with us to stop using them.
